name: Pq-Central
title: Paqari-stat v1
description: Electrochemical device for potential control and current measurement, widely used in research labs for educational applications in energy, environment, or industry.
features: Wireless electrochemical control (Bluetooth) with built-in solar power
Modular design to expand with new experiments
Potential range: -1.5 V to +1.5 V vs Ag
purchase_context: Main hub; works on its own or as the base for complementary modules.

name: Energy-Chem
title: Energy module
description: Module for Pq-Central that enables experiments related to energy generation and storage devices (batteries, capacitors, fuel cells).
features: Designed for energy generation and storage
price_note: Available separately or bundled with Pq-Central
purchase_context: Operates when connected to Pq-Central or as a compact bench for quick energy tests.

name: Digi-Chem
title: Digital Chemistry module
description: Module for experiments related to digital chemistry and automated chemical reactions.
features: Up to 2 modules per Pq-Central unit
purchase_context: Digital companion for Pq-Central that fits seamlessly into educational kits.

name: Spectro
title: Visible/RGB spectrophotometer
description: Device for Visible and/or RGB spectrophotometry. Quantifies concentrations in solutions through color and intensity analysis.
price_note: Works alone or as a Pq-Central module
purchase_context: Standalone instrument compatible with Pq-Central for field or lab color analysis.

name: Paqari-Scope
title: x40 Microscope
description: A microscope for observing samples at small scale. It allows viewing cells and materials prepared in designed experiments: microstructures, microrobots, films, etc.
price_note: Works alone or as a Pq-Central module
purchase_context: Portable microscope usable on its own or alongside Pq-Central to document experiments.

name: NanoMat-Chem
title: Material synthesis module
description: Pq-Central module designed to convert solar energy into chemical energy, enabling the synthesis of advanced materials such as graphene, quantum dots, and metal oxides, among many others.
features: Produces up to 5 V and 2 A
Includes a low-intensity red laser pointer
purchase_context: Built to expand with Pq-Central; can also run independently with its own power supply.
